mphenicol Gray Baby Syndrome. 
Ciprofloxacin Possibility of joint abnormalities (seen in animals). 
Kanamycin and Streptomycin Damage to fetus's ear resulting in deafness (risk of ototoxicity). 
Sulfonamides Jaundice and brain damage in newborn. 
Antineoplastic agents 
Busulfan Birth defects such as less than expected growth before birth, underdevelopment 
of lower jaw, cleft palate, abnormal development of skull bones, spinal defects, ear 
defects and club foot. 
Oral Hypoglycemic drugs A very
